website_summaries.verdict: A highly affordable detangling brush for those with sensitive scalps.
pros: Flexible IntelliFlex bristles are tough on knots but gentle on the scalp
Works well on wet or dry hair
cons: Not as durable as pricier detangling brushes

customer_reviews.title: Life-changing! ❤
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had bought this sooner! My hair is fine but there's a lot of it and I had to deal with a rats nest of tangles no matter how much conditioner or what type I used--until now! Love love love it!
customer_reviews.author: I Heart Cats

customer_reviews.title: Does not detangle
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to help brush through wet hair. Very disappointing. I don’t know what all the hype is about this brush, but this snagged and hurt! I was hoping for an alternative to a pick of my detangling brush, but those were way better then this. Brittles also hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this brush! Great quality. Much needed for my thick head of hair that is incredibly difficult to dry. Also gets my tangles out without ripping hair.
customer_reviews.author: Amarie3

customer_reviews.title: Best. Brush. Ever
customer_reviews.text: Between me and my two girls, we have tons of hair and tons of hair to brush. This is the best brush for painless detangling. I always had problems holding onto the brush and it hurt my hand....but now, with this awesome thicker, fuller, and softer brush handle, we all can enjoy painless brushing!! Thanks for the better handle, Wet Brush!!!
customer_reviews.author: km2008

customer_reviews.title: Glides through tangles without pain!
customer_reviews.text: This brush was recommended to me by my niece. She swore by it. I'm so glad she did! This brush just glided through my wet hair of tangles, without conditioner, like a breeze! I was shocked. It looks like other brushes, but I've never had one that worked so well on wet and dry hair. And I've tried about 15 or so that looks like this one in my 62 years. This is the best. Highly recommend thus brush and this seller!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth B.

customer_reviews.title: Not as impressed as I had hoped
customer_reviews.text: This brush is okay. Not sure why it seems to get raves. It's heavier than it needs to be. I also bought the Wet Brush Go Green Hair Detangler and I like it much better than this brush.
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I have the original wet brush and just bought the pro. The handle is better on the pro. It helps so much I have long, fine hair and this is great for detangling! I am losing much less hair to breakage since using these wet brushes! Both are great products I will continue to buy. I just prefer the sturdier handle on the pro version. After a lot of wear I find the bristles sink into the brush and I have to replace the brush. Totally worth it for the good results on hair!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon L.

customer_reviews.title: Best Brush Ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I always thought these brushes were a rip off, but I was WRONG!!! I will never go back to using another brush. I am a Wet brush user for life. I have also converted my mom and a friend. LOL
customer_reviews.author: arlloyd

customer_reviews.title: Please get this for your little girl with thick hair! She will thank you!
customer_reviews.text: Wet brushes are my absolute favorite. I have EXTREMELY thick wild hair.. I used to cry while brushing, no matter how much detangler I used. Now its a breeze! Please get this for your little girl with thick hair! She will thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Bonsall

customer_reviews.title: Good brush for hair that tangles when wet!
customer_reviews.text: I love this brush! I have really long mixed hair that tangles up when being washed!! This is the best brush I’ve had and I can actually brush through my hair when it’s wet! I brush from the bottom or ends of my hair up to the top!! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Eangelk

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The brush is sturdy and I loved the way it slipped through my thick curly hair so easily without me having a lot of breakage. I would prefer that the handle was a bit longer. Overall, I'm pleased.
customer_reviews.author: MK Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Love ❤️Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this brush it’s soft on my scalp and the rubber handle also has a nice softness to it. (Shoulder-ish thick wavy bleached hair)
customer_reviews.author: roadhawgbbq

customer_reviews.title: Daughters swear by these brushes
customer_reviews.text: BOTH of my daughters agree these brushes are awesome. They don't agree on much, so this says a lot.
customer_reviews.author: J. Carson

customer_reviews.title: Best brush ever
customer_reviews.text: This is my third one Best brush ever. I have thick hair and need a good product 😀 I bought one for my son and daughter also
customer_reviews.author: oc reader

customer_reviews.title: Wet best brush ever
customer_reviews.text: The best detangle brush is WET brand. I love it and my daughter that have a very long hair love it.
customer_reviews.author: Lucian

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: much more ergonomic, bristles are much stronger for detangling my daughters hair. 10/10 you need this brush
customer_reviews.author: Angelina

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Great brush. Don’t know why I didn’t get one aoonery
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Stylist recommended
customer_reviews.text: My stylist recommended this brush and after adjusting to it, I now love it and have purchased more to have one in my car and another at my place of work.
customer_reviews.author: Trish Ann

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as people say
customer_reviews.text: This does not work on long thick hair. The bristles are too weak to dig deep.
customer_reviews.author: M. Riley

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my daughter to replace her Wet Brush that broke. This one is very sturdy with the detangling I expect from this product line.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Just get it.
customer_reviews.text: Just get it. Delta goes with ease and is not so painful because the bristles are thin. Will it make your hair dry faster but will detailed it like a dream.
customer_reviews.author: Paré Frodine

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This brush is amazing. I only use wet brushes but they break easily. I found this pro version and it was a game changer. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Best brush ever!
customer_reviews.text: Love this brush so much for my daughter's curly hair that now I use it!
customer_reviews.author: Lacy Coley

customer_reviews.title: Great Brush!
customer_reviews.text: Love this brush, it goes though my hair with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Fredlov

customer_reviews.title: Tangles handled gently but effectively.
customer_reviews.text: De tangles nicely and is easy to hold. Can't speak to drying power as I do not use it to dry my hair. I have long hair and this brush gets thvtangles out gently with minimum pulling.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Beth

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this brush. Where has this brush been my whole life? I have thick curly hair and this brush easily combs through my hair without damaging.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Wet Brush
customer_reviews.text: The older ones are easier on tangles and don’t pull your hair as bad. These are good quality, but definitely pull your hair. Not so great for tender headed people.
customer_reviews.author: NeonatalRN

customer_reviews.title: Awesome brush!
customer_reviews.text: This brush is amazing! The Pro seems like an update from the original WET brush. My daughter and I love this brush!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Best wet brush
customer_reviews.text: I really like this brush, it definitely works better going through wet hair than dry but still works wonders.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Dorschner

customer_reviews.title: Works Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has beautiful thick hair down to her knees....This brush is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: A Perfect  Detangler
customer_reviews.text: A perfect detangler. No pull, no unnecessary hair loss. I love this brush.
customer_reviews.author: suzanne w

customer_reviews.title: Wet brush
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 10 years old and this brush works perfectly for her long thick hair.
customer_reviews.author: Maryann Brannon

customer_reviews.title: Great brush
customer_reviews.text: Great brush- love wet products. This brush is very sturdy. Looks to last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: games

customer_reviews.title: Best brush ever
customer_reviews.text: Omg best brush ever! Tired of your girls complaining, that brushing their hair hurts? Order this one! I’ve never had a better brush in my life and the best thing about it is, that it’s cheap!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dagmara Bull

customer_reviews.title: Good Brush for Colored Hair
customer_reviews.text: My hair stylist recommended this brush. You loose less hair with it. It works well detangling. Might buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: What tangles
customer_reviews.text: I lose a 10th of the hair with this brush
customer_reviews.author: Brendan O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 of these just in case I misplace one. That’s how good it works.
customer_reviews.author: This is my wife

customer_reviews.title: Love how it gets the tangles out
customer_reviews.text: Love how it gets the tangles out. I was getting ready to cut my hair because of the pain of brushing it. My niece tried to steal mine so I'm buying her one too
customer_reviews.author: Marie Faley

product_meta.title: Wet Brush Brush Pro Detangler Pink
product_meta.description: The Wet Brush Pink detangling comb is the perfect comb for detangling. Wavetooth styling teeth distribute hair evenly across teeth to prevent clumping, snagging and breakage leaving you with healthy tangle-free hair. Easily combs through any hair type or texture and is perfect for combing through conditioner and treatments. A must have for any hairstylist. Measures 3.5" X 9".
feature_bullets: These bristles will glide through any hair type combing out tangles effortlessly
The Wet Brush can be used on wet or dry hair and works on extensions and wigs
Soft flexible IntelliFlex bristles detangle hair with ease.
The package dimension of the product is 8"L x 4"W x 2"H
